Trade/Device Name(s): OneTouch Verio Sync Blood Glucose Monitoring System
OneTouch Verio Sync Blood Glucose Meter
Submitter Information: LifeScan Europe, a Division of Cilag GmbH International
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): OneTouch Verio Sync Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OneTouch Verio Sync Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip by a single user for self-testing at home as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
